DrifterMod:DexDownPower.NAME: Dex Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Dexterity at the end of the turn.

DrifterMod:DriftingPower.NAME: Drift Momentum
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain this whenever you gain #yDrift (Max 2.) At the end of the turn if you don't have this power, lose all of your #yDrift.

DrifterMod:DriftPower.NAME: Drift
DESCRIPTIONS: damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of the turn, then lose half your #yDrift. If you have no #yDrift #yMomentum, lose it all instead.
damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of the turn, then lose half your #yDrift. If you have no #yDrift #yMomentum, lose it all instead.

DrifterMod:TempRetainPower.NAME: Retain
DESCRIPTIONS: Keep #b cards in your hand this turn only.

DrifterMod:ThornsDownPower.NAME: Thorns Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Thorns at the start of your turn.

DrifterMod:DriftStrengthDownPower.NAME: Drifting Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Strength if you lose your Drift.

DrifterMod:TempMaxHandSizeInc.NAME: Overdraw
DESCRIPTIONS: While your hand is not full, draw 1 card and lose 1 Overdraw until your hand is full. Overdraw: #b

DrifterMod:OverdrawNextTurn.NAME: Overdraw
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, draw 2. If your hand is full, draw when it empties.

DrifterMod:ThermalPower.NAME: Thermal Engines
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you would draw while your hand is full each turn, gain [E]
times you would draw while your hand is full each turn, gain [E]

DrifterMod:AeroPower.NAME: Aerodynamic
DESCRIPTIONS: When you discard, draw #b cards (Up to amount discarded)

DrifterMod:BalancePower.NAME: Balanced
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play an even number of cards this turn, draw #b

DrifterMod:ZoomPower.NAME: Zoom Power
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a card this turn, deal #b

DrifterMod:Speedup.NAME: Speed
DESCRIPTIONS: extra card at the start of your turn and gain these effects based on your Speed:
extra card at the start of your turn and gain these effects based on your Speed:

DrifterMod:InControlPower.NAME: In Control
DESCRIPTIONS: [E] for each card discarded this turn only.
[E] for each card discarded this turn only.

DrifterMod:CoolPower.NAME: In the Zone
DESCRIPTIONS: Block when you draw a card.
Block when you draw a card.

DrifterMod:FireTrailPower.NAME: Flame Trail
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal damage to all enemies equal to your driftermod:Total-Hand.
At the start of your turn, deal damage to all enemies equal to your driftermod:Total-Hand times #b

DrifterMod:DriftSweepPower.NAME: Drift Sweep
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Drift hits all enemies this turn.

DrifterMod:GambitPower.NAME: Final Gambit Power
DESCRIPTIONS: time you die while Vulnerable, heal to 5% HP.
times you die while Vulnerable, heal to 5% HP.

DrifterMod:ResolvePower.NAME: Resolve Power
DESCRIPTIONS: While you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, gain #b

DrifterMod:SupersonicPower.NAME: Supersonic
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a card this turn, gain #b

DrifterMod:FuelReservePower.NAME: Fuel Reserves
DESCRIPTIONS: If your hand is empty, draw #b

DrifterMod:AdaptabilityPower.NAME: Adaptability
DESCRIPTIONS: If your hand is empty, draw #b
